description: SSL certificate not trusted by system - certificate chain validation failed. Security and trust issue.
solutions: Install proper CA-signed certificate on server
Add custom CA to trust store (debug only)
Never bypass certificate validation in production
prevention: Test on multiple devices and Android versions
examples: // Network Security Config for debug: <certificates src="user" />
try { connection.connect() } catch (e: SSLHandshakeException) { if (e.message?.contains("not trusted") == true) showCertificateError() }
// NEVER in production: trustManager.checkServerTrusted(chain, authType) // Bypass
